message: He said "We're going to love you until you can love yourself. And...I see something in you that you can't see yet." This is an older article but we love sharing it. One person can create change. This Judge altered the paths of countless lives for the better. Being trauma informed is essential when working in the anti-human trafficking industry.

attachments.media_description: For Victims of Sex Trafficking, A Therapeutic Court Provides A Way Out
